CountryDisplacement.description: CountryDisplacement represents displacement metrics for a single country.

hostAsylumSeekers.description: Asylum seekers hosted by this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

hostRefugees.description: Refugees hosted by this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

hostTotal.description: Total persons hosted by this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

idps.description: Internally displaced persons within this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

refugees.description: Refugees originating from this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

stateless.description: Stateless persons associated with this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

totalDisplaced.description: Total displaced from this country.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

CountryPopulationEntry.description: CountryPopulationEntry represents a country with population data.

population.description: Total population.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

DisplacementFlow.description: DisplacementFlow represents a refugee movement corridor between two countries.

asylumCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the asylum country.

originCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the origin country.

refugees.description: Number of refugees in this flow.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

DisplacementSummary.description: DisplacementSummary represents a global overview of displacement data from UNHCR.

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

ExposureResult.description: ExposureResult contains the population exposure estimate.

densityPerKm2.description: Population density used for the estimate.

exposedPopulation.description: Estimated exposed population.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

exposureRadiusKm.description: Radius used for the estimate in km.

nearestCountry.description: ISO3 code of nearest priority country.

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

GetDisplacementSummaryRequest.description: GetDisplacementSummaryRequest specifies parameters for retrieving displacement data.

countryLimit.description: Maximum number of country entries to return.

flowLimit.description: Maximum number of displacement flows to return.

year.description: Data year to retrieve (e.g., 2023). Uses latest available if zero.

GetDisplacementSummaryResponse.description: GetDisplacementSummaryResponse contains the global displacement summary.

GetPopulationExposureRequest.description:
GetPopulationExposureRequest supports two modes:
 - countries mode (default): returns the priority countries list
 - exposure mode: estimates population within a radius of a point

radius.description: Radius in km (required for exposure mode, defaults to 50).

GetPopulationExposureResponse.description: GetPopulationExposureResponse returns either a countries list or an exposure estimate.

asylumSeekers.description: Total asylum seekers worldwide.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

idps.description: Total internally displaced persons worldwide.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

refugees.description: Total recognized refugees worldwide.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

stateless.description: Total stateless persons worldwide.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

total.description: Grand total of displaced persons.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

post.description: GetDisplacementSummary retrieves global refugee and IDP statistics from UNHCR.
GetPopulationExposure returns country population data or estimates population within a radius.
